title: Midterm's Reality Check
description:
With two weeks to go before the midterms, Democrats and Republicans are sprinting to the finish line. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News Washington bureau chief Craig Gordon on what the latest polls are saying and the role President Trump is playing in the GOP's attempt to hold onto power. 
FOLLOW UP
You can follow Craig at: @dcraiggordon
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
itunes:subtitle: with Craig Gordon (Bloomberg News)
